name: Bullet World
description:
Hey! Do you like dodging bullets? Do you like shooting bullets? In 4 directions at the same time? Then you'll absolutely LOVE Bullet World! In this 2-D top-down shooter game, you take control of bill the robot, shoot baddies, and dodge many, many bullets! Collect the right coins and kill the right enemies to proceed to the next level. Can you beat all 32 levels in the game? How far can you make it?

P.S. You gain 5 HP and 20 ammo every 50,000 points you collect. (You'll need it!)
